name: Chicken Spaghetti Casserole I
author: Marty
summary: For some reason or another, this seems to be a favorite of the men in my family.
ingredients: ¼ cup chopped green bell pepper
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Put uncooked spaghetti in a large pot of salted boiling water
Let simmer, stirring occasionally, for 8 to 10 minutes or until pasta is al dente
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large bowl combine the chicken, cooked spaghetti, pimento, bell pepper, onion, soup, wine and 1 cup of the cheese
Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix all together
Spread mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes
Sprinkle remaining cup of cheese on top and bake for another 15 minutes
